resources.string: Sustainability Side Quests
Recycle and learn about sustainability to earn points! exchange your points for in-game currency of your favorite games. Don’t miss out on these free rewards!
Use our AI while taking photos of your\nday-to-day recycling to earn points!
Learn about different ways\nsustainability affects you to earn points!
Talk to our AI Chatbot about\nsustainability and inequality!
Spend your points to earn in-game\ncurrency for your favorite video games!
Recycle Rush
As you recycle, take photos of each item to earn points! If the AI detects that it is recycling, then the points get added to your total. The more you recycle, the more points you can earn!
Quest Log
Learn about the different aspects of sustainability and inequality and how they affect each other. Each quest rewards you with 100 points!
What is Sustainability?
Trash VS Recycling
Different Types of Plastic
Why Recycle?
Landfills and Pollution
Minorities and Sustainability
Gender Ratio in Waste Management
Rewards

Time to use those points! We’ve partnered with the following games to help create a more sustainable future. Choose a game and log into your account to transfer your points. All conversion rates are based on the value of a $20 gift card.
Sust.AI.nability
Talk to our AI Chatbot for 10m to earn 100 points! You can chat about anything related to sustainability and inequality and how they affect each other.
(Did not earn chat points yet for this week)
Hello! I am your sust.AI.nability chat bot! What would you like to talk about today?
That\'s a great thought! Unfortunately my chat function isn\'t working yet, but I can\'t wait to have a conversation with you!
